mapper.select: select * from food where food_name like concat('%',#{param1},'%') order by food_code desc limit #{param2},10;
select count(*) from food where food_name like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
select * from food where ${param1} like concat('%',#{param2},'%') order by food_code desc limit #{param3},15;
select * from e_nutrition order by e_nutrition_id asc
